solution_line_template: So he scored {num_tetrises}*{tetris_points}=<<{num_tetrises}*{tetris_points}={total_tetris_points}>>{total_tetris_points} points from tetrises
He also scores {num_singles}*{single_line_points}=<<{num_singles}*{single_line_points}={total_single_points}>>{total_single_points} points from singles
So in total he scores {total_tetris_points}+{total_single_points}=<<{total_tetris_points}+{total_single_points}={total_score}>>{total_score} points
